title: CSI: Vegas
excerpt: CSI: Vegas opens a brand new chapter in Las Vegas, the city where it all began.

title: The Map of Tiny Perfect Things
excerpt: Two teens live the same day repeatedly, enabling them to create the titular map.

A group of astronauts living in the emptiness of space awaken to find Earth has suffered an extinction level event. Marooned on a dying space station, they must fight for survival; fighting each other, unforeseen threats, and the horror of what it means to be the last humans alive.

title: Chiefs
excerpt: In Los Angeles County, three female police chiefs work together to catch a serial killer.

title: CSI: Crime Scene Investigation
excerpt:
CSI: Crime Scene Investigation (commonly referred to as CSI) was a popular, Emmy Award-winning CBS television series that trails the investigations of a team of Las Vegas forensic scientists as they unveil the circumstances behind mysterious and unusual deaths and crimes committed.

CSI aired for 15 seasons, from 2000-15, and concluded with a 2 hour movie in the 2015-16 season.

title: Accidental Icon: The Real Gidget Story
excerpt: Also called Gidget: The Accidental Icon, Accidental Icon: The Real Gidget Story is a documentary about the life the real 'Gidget,' Kathy Kohner Zuckerman.

title: 3 Weeks to Daytona
excerpt: 3 Weeks to Daytona is the movie of a down on his luck stock car racer with one dream left to hold onto, drive with best. Unfortunately, with a busted car, no money, and bad job, Chuck's limelight could be fading fast. When a final chance falls his way, can he patch things up with his son, crew chief, and turn himself around before its too late?

title: Drop Dead Diva
excerpt: Drop Dead Diva was about Jane, a plus-size lawyer whose body is inhabited by the soul of a dead fashion model.

title: Next Exit
excerpt: Next Exit is a film about Charles, a teenager who is running away with his best friend, Jason Robinson, to Los Angeles.

title: Down with the Joneses
excerpt: Down with the Jonses is a dark comedy.

title: The West Wing
excerpt: The West Wing was a popular and widely acclaimed American television serial drama set in the White House during the fictional Democratic administration of Josiah 'Jed' Bartlet.

title: Dodges City
excerpt: Dodges City was about 20-something extreme private investigator.

title: The True Story
excerpt: The True Story was a TV pilot about a surgical intern and her brother, a rookie cop, getting on with their life, now that their father was in jail for killing their mother when they were young children.

title: Memento
excerpt: Memento is about a man with a short-term memory disorder caused by an assault that killed his wife. While he cannot remember his recent past, he struggles to avenge his wife's death.

title: Food for the Heart
excerpt: Food For the Heart (originally 'The Hungry Bachelors Club') is the spicy story of best friends Delmar Youngblood and Hortense, two single women who share their love of food and friendship with an eccentric circle of half-baked family and friends at the Hungry Bachelors Club.

title: Forever Fabulous
excerpt: Forever Fabulous (originally 'Tiara Tango') is the story of pageant organizer and Former Miss Texas Gal 1969, trying to recapture her glory.

title: ER
excerpt: ER was an Emmy Award-winning drama series centering on the medical personnel in the emergency room of a Chicago hospital.

title: Partners
excerpt: Partners was about a drifter who finds himself caught in the middle of an international crime caper after stealing a briefcase.

title: How to Make the Cruelest Month
excerpt: How to Make the Cruelest Month set in a small college town, about neurotic Bell Bryant who explains her problems directly to the camera.

title: Velocity Trap
excerpt: Velocity Trap is about a police officer trying to protect a federal banking ship from being robbed.

title: House of Frankenstein 1997
excerpt: House of Frankenstein 1997 was a TV Movie putting a modern spin on the ancient horrors.

title: Ellen
excerpt: Ellen was a comedy TV series about Ellen and her friends, staring Ellen DeGeneres.

title: Alchemy
excerpt: Alchemy chronicles the emotional crisis and inner journey of a young woman as she pieces together her life–and her art.

title: Courthouse
excerpt: Courthouse portrays every-day life in one courthouse, mostly dealing with trials and tribulations of people who are employed there - judges, district attorneys and public defenders.

title: The Jerky Boys
excerpt: The Jerky Boys is about two 30-something losers who make prank phone calls and anger a mob boss.

title: Dead Funny
excerpt: Dead Funny is about Viv (Elizabeth Pena), and Reggie (Andrew McCarthy) who live in separate New York apartments. Their relationship is based on sex and sick practical jokes. They used to think it was dead funny. Now Reggie's just dead.

title: Missing Persons
excerpt: Missing Persons was a television show about missing people, and the detectives who tried to track them down while putting their own lives back together.

title: Law & Order
excerpt: Law & Order is about the Criminal Justice System. The people are represented by two separate, yet equally important groups. The police who investigate crime and the District Attorneys who prosecute the offenders. These are their stories.

title: Lifestories: Families in Crisis
notes: – Dead Drunk: The Kevin Tunell Story (1993)
excerpt: Dead Drunk: The Kevin Tunell Story is about the true story of a man who kills a girl while drunk driving.

title: ABC Afterschool Specials
notes:
– Summer Stories: The Mall - Part 3 (1993)
– Summer Stories: The Mall - Part 2 (1993)
– Summer Stories: The Mall - Part 1 (1993)
excerpt: Summer Stories: The Mall was an ABC miniseries, much in the vein of their after school specials.

title: Happy Hell Night
excerpt: Happy Hell Night is about the devil's henchman who escapes from an asylum and stops at a fraternity house he visited 25 years before.

title: Nineteen
excerpt: Nineteen was a comedy about a couple who married at 19.

title: The Kill-Off
excerpt: Alchemy is about a man, his girlfriend, and his neighbors. He decides to kill his gossipy wife, whom everyone hates...
